mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO advertise_data_tb ( pvs, uvs, ips, forward, daily_day, advertise_id ) VALUES ( #{pvs}, #{uvs}, #{ips}, #{forward}, #{dailyDay}, #{advertiseId})
mapper.update: UPDATE advertise_data_tb SET pvs=#{pvs}, uvs=#{uvs}, ips=#{ips}, forward=#{forward}, daily_day=#{dailyDay}, advertise_id=#{advertiseId} WHERE advertise_data_id=#{advertiseDataId}
mapper.select: SELECT advertise_data_id, pvs, uvs, ips, forward, daily_day, advertise_id FROM advertise_data_tb WHERE advertise_data_id=#{advertiseDataId}
SELECT advertise_data_id, pvs, uvs, ips, forward, daily_day, advertise_id FROM advertise_data_tb WHERE advertise_id=#{advertiseId} AND DATE(daily_day)=DATE(#{dailyDay})
SELECT advertise_data_id, pvs, uvs, ips, forward, daily_day, advertise_id FROM advertise_data_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT advertise_data_id, pvs, uvs, ips, forward, daily_day, advertise_id FROM advertise_data_tb WHERE advertise_id=#{advertiseId} AND daily_day BETWEEN #{startDailyDay} AND #{endDailyDay} ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay}
